dict.acceptation: 每件事物；最重要的东西；（有关的）一切；万事；

sent.orig: She has felt everything, borne everything, experienced everything, suffered everything, lost everything, mourned everything.
sent.trans: 她已经感受了一切，容忍了一切，体会了一切，放弃了一切，失去了一切，痛哭过一切。

sent.orig: You forgive everything, you accept everything, you justify everything.
sent.trans: 你原谅一切，你接受一切，你证明一切。

sent.orig: Everything ornately upholstered, everything carefully finished, everything remarkably reserved.
sent.trans: 一切都布置得十分华丽，一切都安排得非常细致，一切都显得那么矜持而高不可攀。

sent.orig: When everything is connected to everything in a distributed network, everything happens at once.
sent.trans: 当分布式网络中的一切都互相链接起来时，一切都会同时发生。

sent.orig: The old believe everything; the middle-aged suspect everything; the young know everything.
sent.trans: 老年人相信一切；中年人怀疑一切；年轻人知道一切。
